venue.address_1: Between Church, Elm, Temple and Chapel streets
venue.name: Lower New Haven Green

item.description:
so filming is set to begin in New Haven for select scenes for the upcoming 4th Indiana Jones film, and it seems that Lucasfim/Paramount and the New Haven Office of Cultural Affairs are conspiring to bring us a supersize helping of the franchise this Tuesday evening with the highlight being (as far as i'm concerned) a screening of "Raiders of the Lost Ark" on the lower green at 9:15. apparently free popcorn will be available, but you may wish to bring a blanket, bug spray, and of course booze.

i'll probably be arriving a little before 7 to catch a performance by the "Aerial Angels" street performers. why? here's the description from the infonewhaven flyer: "All female acrobatic troupe featuring whip cracking and fire eating." need more be said?

since there's a gap between the angels performance and the flick, i may mosey over to Bottega Cafe for as-yet-unknown drink specials, or to the "Temple Grill of Doom" (no, really, that's what they're calling it) for $1 burgers and dogs. there's no telling if the staff will be chanting "kali ma, shakti day", but if you go you might want to keep your heart covered just in case.

questions? comments? insults? call ben (your contact for this event): 203-554-5144. feel free to drop me a buzz anytime before 9 to find out where i/we am/are.

ps for more details on everything else Indy-related going on that evening between 5 and 9, click here.
item.name: Tues. 6/26 - Movie on the Green: Raiders of the Lost Ark
